name: The Fight of Konoha
description:
This 2 Player Game is a very fun Game to play with your Friends. There are figting Naruto vs Sasuke. Please send me a feedback in the comments because it is my first game.

Controlls:

Player 1(Naruto): WASD and for throw Shuriken F

Player 2(Sasuke): Arrow Keys and for throw Shuriken K

Hope you enjoy!
